title: Teen shot in Rochester, expected to recover
content:
Rochester, N.Y. – Police in Rochester are investigating after a 15-year-old was shot Wednesday afternoon.
Police said the shooting happened in front of 1306 Dewey Avenue. They said the teen walked into Rochester General Hospital around 4:40 p.m.
Police said the teen was shot in the lower body and is expected to recover.
There is no word yet on whether an arrest has been made.
